### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)), offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5)), and pipe connections.

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace(position (60.0, -60.0)) and a burner inserter(position (60.5, -61.5)).

### Copper cable factory
No structures found related to copper cable production.

### Storage at position (62.5, -61.5)
Consists of a wooden chest(position (62.5, -61.5)).


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.
- Check the entity's inventory and fuel status before inserting items.

### Errors when placing entities next to other entities
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.
- Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction when placing entities next to other entities.

### Errors when working with fluid systems
- Ensure that the fluid system is properly connected and that there are no blockages or leaks.
- Check the fluid levels and temperatures in the system to ensure they are within the required ranges.


### NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables were defined or assigned in the given execution logs.
